Feat.Name: Echoing Soul
Feat.Description:
Your soul is fractured, shifted, or connected to another in some way. Gain +3 to all Skills plus an additional +1 for every 2 Character Levels. Gain +1 to all Saving Throws plus an additional +1 every 3 Character Levels.
When you get hit in Melee or Ranged attacks, there is a very small chance your Echoing Soul will cause you to become Afraid, Blinded, or Immobilized for six seconds with no save. Immunities to these conditions do not apply to this effect.

Feat.Name: Form of Pain
Feat.Description:
Your body is cursed to be prone to all manner of damage, but with the ability to withstand it.
When you take damage your body changes and you gain the Form of Pain effect which grants +2 PRR/MRR but also reduces movement speed and increases spell costs by 1% as the pain distracts you. This can stack 10 times, with one stack being removed every 5 seconds.

Effect.DisplayName: Form of Pain: Stacks from being hit
Form of Pain: Spell Point cost

Feat.Name: Living Shadow
Feat.Description:
Your Shadow extends your reach, acting out your dark impulse, nearly doubling your range with melee weapons.
Yet, there is a small change when you critical hit a target that the shadow drains you briefly, reducing your damage by 15% for 6 seconds. This can only occur once every 30 seconds.

Feat.Name: Minion of the Eldritch
Feat.Description:
Cooldown: 2 minutes Target: Self
Your soul has touched something beyond the planes, and a connection has formed there. Activate: You gain +5 Spell Power per Character Level, and +1% Spell Critical Damage for every 2 Character Levels you have for 12 seconds.
When you use this ability, there is a chance the Eldritch Being you reach out to will grow tired of your petitions and decide to punish you instead. This chance increases each time you use this ability between rests.

Stance.Name: Minion of the Eldritch
Stance.Description: YYour soul has touched something beyond the planes, and a connection has formed there. Activate: You gain +5 Spell Power per Character Level, and +1% Spell Critical Damage for every 2 Character Levels you have for 12 seconds.

Feat.Name: Mist Walker
Feat.Description:
Cooldown: 2 minutes Target: Self
You have learned how to navigate the Mists with time and a little luck. Trigger this ability to leap forward, and briefly gain a +5 bonus to Reflex Saves and a stacking 20% bonus to Incorporeality defense. This feat shares a cooldown with Abundant Step.
When using this ability there is a small chance the mists will nearly catch up and you will become Exhausted for 6 seconds, -50% penalty to movement speed, -6 to Strength and Dexterity, cannot tumble. Normal immunities or remedies to exhaustion will not protect against this.

Feat.Name: Touch of Death
Feat.Description: Every touch causes life to wilt, but you can use this power if you know the way... Gain +3 Negative Spell power and Negative Healing Amplification per Character Level. Lose 5 Positive Spell Power and Healing Amplification per Character Level.

Feat.Name: Webtouched Wretch
Feat.Description:
You've become entwined with a great cosmic web, which occasionally becomes coterminous with reality. Your offensive spells, melee and ranged attacks occasionally cause strange spectral webs to coat your enemies either slowing them or entangling them for up to 6 seconds with no save.
When you get hit with Melee or Ranged attacks, there is a small chance the webs turn on your, applying a weakened slow effect which lasts 6 seconds but can stack 3 times. Spells/Immunities like Freedom of Movement do not prevent this.

Feat.Name: Pact: The Dark Powers
Feat.Description:
Your patron is among the Dark Powers of Ravenloft, calling to you from the Mists. If you can remain within their favor, they will allow you to manipulate the Mists, bringing power and death.
Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Evil damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Dread Mist 5 - Lesser Death Aura 9 - Ray of Exhaustion 14 - Death Aura 17 - Dust to Dust 19 - Greater Death Aura

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Evil damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: The Dark Powers
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Evil damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Mist Favored
Feat.Description: Your Dread Mists' damage changes to 1d3 per Caster Level. This increases to 1d4 at Character Level 12.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Call on the Mists
Feat.Description: Enemies in a small area who are currently affected by Dread Mist must make a saving throw (DC 15 + [Int/Cha] mod + Necromancy Bonuses) or die, being consumed by the mists.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Lesser Death Aura
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Dust to Dust
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Greater Death Aura
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: Unknown Passive Bonus: Unknown. This feat can be stacked up to three times.
